CustomField.description: Used for Content search from the custom link on opportunities.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Primary_Competition__c , "1 ADP", "ADP", "2 Ceridian", "Ceridian", "3 Interpay", "Interpay", "4 In-House", "In-House", "5 INTUIT/QUICKBKS", "QUICKBOOKS", "9 New Business/No Competition", "New Business", "OTHER" )
CustomField.label: Primary Competitor Name
